channel.title: Fantasy | Boyfriend ASMR [M4A]
channel.description: Welcome to your go-to fantasy podcast for comforting M4A ASMR. Each episode is made just for you: gentle words, warm vibes, and a hint of magic to brighten your day. Iâ€™m here to make you feel loved and cared for. Whether youâ€™re winding down for the night or maybe just need a moment to feel seen, these audios are for you. Itâ€™s not about being perfect; itâ€™s about being realâ€”even in this little fantasy. So, find your cozy spot (probably your bed), hit play, and letâ€™s escape the world together.

item.title: [M4A] Helping Your Vamp Boyfriend Catch His First Meal - Fantasy Boyfriend ASMR [M4M] [M4F]
item.description:
i recorded an audio but i didnt realize it was m4m :) yeah i'll post it as a bonus one, even if the majority of you guys are girls. wait...----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Twitter: https://x.com/LSnugglepaws----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lsnugglepawsMy members:- renranrenTiers:1. Snugglepaw 1,99$ - With this tier, you get behind the scenes content, early access (plus two audios a week), work in progress updates, live chat, fan requests, you can download my audios and listen to them offline, and you'll get a shoutout on my YouTube channel (in the description and on the YouTube video as text itself).What's included:- Behind-the-scenes content- Early access- Work-in-progress updates (digital)- Live chat- Fan requests- Digital downloads- Member shout-out2. Grand Snugglepaw 2,99$ - Same as the previous tier, but once a month you get a personal commission (whether I post it on YouTube or not depends on you)----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Commissions: A 10 minute audio when you have a script costs 2$. If you want me to write the script, then the price is 5$. You can reach out for commissions to me on Ko-fi:https://ko-fi.com/lieutenantsnugglepaws/commissions----------------------------------------------------------------------------------The script was written by u/WhiteKatAudios. It was posted on scriptbin under the title "[A4A] Your S.O Becomes a Vampire"----------------------------------------------------------------------------------I hope you guys enjoyed the audio! If you have any suggestions on how to improve my voice acting let me know!
#asmr #sleepaid #m4a #audio #comfort #va #relaxing #relaxingasmr #sleep #cuddles #m4m #m4f #boyfriendasmr #cute #wholesome #deepvoice

item.title: [M4A] You Turn the Villain Good Again [Mage x Kind Human] [Fantasy Boyfriend ASMR] [M4F] [M4M]
item.description:
Wow this... took a while. I didn't expect it to be almost over two hours. I'm surprised I even managed to do it. This is the first time I'm doing a series so I hope I did it justice! Anyway as always, everything here is just fiction. Just voice acting!Here are the time stamps:00:00:00 - Part 100:12:16 - Part 200:28:39 - Part 300:43:43 - Part 401:01:47 - Part 501:17:21 - Part 601:29:48 - Part 701:43:48 - Part 8----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lsnugglepawsMy members:- renranrenTiers:1. Snugglepaw 1,99$ - With this tier, you get behind the scenes content, early access (plus two audios a week), work in progress updates, live chat, fan requests, you can download my audios and listen to them offline, and you'll get a shoutout on my YouTube channel (in the description and on the YouTube video as text itself).What's included:- Behind-the-scenes content- Early access- Work-in-progress updates (digital)- Live chat- Fan requests- Digital downloads- Member shout-out2. Grand Snugglepaw 2,99$ - Same as the previous tier, but once a month you get a personal commission (whether I post it on YouTube or not depends on you)----------------------------------------------------------------------------------The scripts were written by BluechanXD and posted on scriptbin under the titles:
  1. A4A AA4A M4A F4A Rehabilitating A Villain [Part 1] [Fantasy] [Drama] [Enemies to ???] [Slow Burn] [Captured Villain Speaker] [Kind Listener] [Evil] [Sadistic] [Hostile] [Manipulative] [Frustration] [Blood Violence] [Threats of Violence]
  2. A4A M4A F4A AA4A Rehabilitating A Villain [Part 2] [Fantasy] [Drama] [Enemies to ???] [Slow Burn] [Captured Villain Speaker] [Kind Listener] [Bratty] [Complaining] [Anxious] [Attempt At Friendship] [Mentions of Death] [Threats of Violence]

  4. A4A Rehabilitating A Villain [Part 4] [Fantasy] [Drama] [Enemies to ???] [Slow Burn] [Captured Villain Speaker] [Kind Listener] [Sick Speaker] [Threats of Violence] [Mentions of Death] [Reverse Comfort] [Friendship Building] [Heart-to-Heart] [Slightly Obsessive] [Hugging]
  5. A4A AA4A M4A F4A Rehabilitating A Villain [Part 5] [Fantasy] [Drama] [Enemies to ???] [Slow Burn] [Captured Villain Speaker] [Kind Listener] [Yandere] [Obsessive] [Dependent] [Begging] [Hugging] [Threats of Violence]
  6. A4A AA4A M4A F4A Rehabilitating A Villain [Part 6] [Fantasy] [Drama] [Enemies to ???] [Slow Burn] [Captured Villain Speaker] [Kind Listener] [Yandere] [Unhinged] [Obsessive] [Begging] [Threats of Violence] [Mentions of Death]

Some days later you begin to feel feverish and a strong and odd anger starts to take over your mind and body. You feel like you're about to turn into a wild animal yourself. And you do. item.title: [M4A] Vampire Forcefully Converts You and Makes You His [Yandere Vampire X Hunter] [Enemies to Lovers] [M4F] [M4F]
item.description:
This took me a long time to make so I really hope you like it :') For any reasons, my content is purely fictional. Do not recreate anything mentioned in it. :)
Here's the timestamps:00:00 Warning00:24 Part 111:13 Part 223:50 Part 3----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Twitter: https://x.com/LSnugglepaws----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Commissions: A 10 minute audio when you have a script costs 2$. If you want me to write the script, then the price is 5$. You can reach out for commissions to me on Ko-fi:https://ko-fi.com/lieutenantsnugglepaws/commissions----------------------------------------------------------------------------------The scripts were written by u/joylandblah. They were posted on scriptbin under the titles:
Part 1 - "[M4A] Oh, The Irony! [Part 1] [Vampire Speaker] [Hunter Listener] [Enemies to Lovers] [Yandere] [Slap] [Condescending] [Biting] [Sucking] [Turning] [L-bombs] [Series]"Summary: You are a experient hunter known and feared in the supernatural world. Once you set your eyes on a target, they know it's over for them, but things change when a vampire that you never saw in the area before appears at your house and starts to play with its food. You. Will your strong hate for monsters help you defeat this vampire, or will he show you who's really the true hunter?
Part 2 - "[M4A] Oh, The Irony! [Part 2] [Vampire Speaker] [Hunter Listener] [Newborn Vampire] [Yandere] [Flirty] [Forced Kiss] [Bites] [Spicy] [Forced Feeding] [Violence] [Delusional] [L-bombs] [Series]"Summary: You were a monster hunter. Then a psychotic vampire who's obssessed with you showed up and turned you into a soulless creature like him. After the transformation, you wake up chained up in a cell and he explains that it would be better for the both of you if you obey him. He didn't know, however, just how stubborn you could be.
Part 3 - "[M4A] Oh, The Irony! [Alternative Ending] [Finale] [Vampire Speaker] [Vampire Listener] [Yandere] [Kisses] [Hugging] [Reverse Confession] [L-bombs] [Plot Twist] [Together Forever] [Series]"Summary: You don't know for how long you've been trapped inside the vampire's dungeon, but it sure feels like months. During this time, he has been visiting you and having his way with you every single day, and you started not only to wait for him, but also to crave for his presence. You know a part of you is now obssessed with him the same way he's obssessed with you, but the other part is still trying to fight for the beliefs you had when you were still human. Which part of you will win the internal battle? The monster or the human?----------------------------------------------------------------------------------I hope you guys enjoyed the audio! If you have any suggestions on how to improve my voice acting let me know!
#asmr #sleepaid #m4a #audio #comfort #va #relaxing #relaxingasmr #sleep #cuddles #m4m #m4f #boyfriendasmr #cute #wholesome #deepvoice

item.title: [M4A] Waking up to Your Boyfriend in Full Tactical Gear | Solider/Military Boyfriend ASMR [M4M/M4F]
item.description:
There you go Â @Celestial_being3814. For legal and any other reasons, everything in this video/audio is fictional and I don't know any government secrets nor do I work in the military or for any government organization. :)----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Twitter: https://x.com/LSnugglepaws----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Commissions: A 10 minute audio when you have a script costs 2$. If you want me to write the script, then the price is 5$. You can reach out for commissions to me on Ko-fi:https://ko-fi.com/lieutenantsnugglepaws/commissions----------------------------------------------------------------------------------This script was written by me :) The full title is "m4a waking up to your boyfriend in full tactical gear military outfit solider boyfriend asmr boyfriend audio m4m m4f"
The art was made by SgtCrisis. Here's a link to it https://www.deviantart.com/sgtcrisis/art/ICNG-Clothing-Daniel-Nadez-524111856Here's some note from the artist: "One more before going to bed!
Daniel Nadez, age 28 years old, 6'1ft, 210lbs. Daniel is the son of Carl and Sarah Nadez. He is a police officer partnered to Naomi Anderson, and engaed to pediatrcian Michelle Palmer. Things seem to be going well for Daniel, but his constant need to impress his mother has caused a rift with his Fiance, and she leaves him to teach him a lesson. This drives him into a deep depression,a dn he moves back home with his parents.
1. Patrol outfit- the LAPD patrol outfit Daniel and Naomi wear.2. Going out clothes- Daniel's outfit bought by his fashionable fiance. before Michelle, Daniel had horrible tastes, and would've worn a hoodie and jeans, but know he is main attraction everytime they go out.3. Sleep wear- Daniel wears sweats to bed as normal underwear is a bit constricting due to his "size". they also provided easy access to his fiance, who would enjoy partaking in it.4. Training- Daniel's training outfit, when he is at the gym at work. He also uses it while at the firing range, like Naomi.5. baseball- Daniel is the star pitcher for his team, and they play every other saturday. It's the one thing daniel is confidant he is good at.
More to come when i get ideas, lols"Â© 2015 - 2024 SgtCrisis----------------------------------------------------------------------------------I hope you guys enjoyed the audio! If you have any suggestions on how to improve my voice acting let me know!
#asmr #sleepaid #m4a #audio #comfort #va #relaxing #relaxingasmr #sleep #cuddles #m4m #m4f #boyfriendasmr #cute #wholesome #deepvoice

item.title: [M4A] Flirty Vampire Catches You [Biting] [Vampire x Hunter] | Boyfriend ASMR [M4F] [M4M]
item.description:
This is my second vampire audio! I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it. About my mental health, it's been better. The other day was a rough day, but I'm okay now. I just know if I keep pushing forward, I can get out...----------------------------------------------------------------------------------My Twitter: https://x.com/LSnugglepaws----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Commissions: A 10 minute audio when you have a script costs 2$. If you want me to write the script, then the price is 5$. You can reach out for commissions to me on Ko-fi:https://ko-fi.com/lieutenantsnugglepaws/commissions----------------------------------------------------------------------------------This script was written by u/SpeakSoftCarryAStick and posted on r/ASMRScriptHaven. The full title is "[A4A] [M4A] [F4A] Vampire Hunter Caught Sneaking Into A Vampire Soiree [Supernatural] [Vampire] [Biting] [Enemies To Allies] [Threatening] [Playful]"----------------------------------------------------------------------------------I hope you guys enjoyed the audio! If you have any suggestions on how to improve my voice acting let me know!
#asmr #sleepaid #m4a #audio #comfort #va #relaxing #relaxingasmr #sleep #cuddles #m4m #m4f #boyfriendasmr #cute #wholesome #deepvoice
